items.title: WATCH:  Hero middle schoolers help save bus driver
items.description: Surveillance video from inside a school bus shows the moment heroic students in Ashland, Ohio, helped save a bus driver in medical distress.

items.title: Dangerous snowstorm coming to NYC area
items.description: A major winter storm is bringing snow and ice from Minnesota to Massachusetts on Friday.

items.title: WATCH:  New York City subway MetroCard to be retired
items.description: The iconic card was swiped by millions daily for the past 32 years and will be retired Dec. 31.

items.title: WATCH:  Kīlauea’s summit eruption marks 1-year anniversary
items.description: Hawaii's Kilauea volcano marked one year of continuous eruptions as Episode 39 sent lava fountains more than 1,000 feet into the air Wednesday.

items.title: WATCH:  Santa Claus caught speeding through streets of Ohio
items.description: Police body camera video shows Santa Claus being pulled over for speeding in Ohio, with officers reminding him that even Kris Kringle has to follow th...
